episode.title: Consolidated Freightways Corp. of Del. v. Kassel

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In the seconds case, 79-1618, Consolidated Freightways against Kassel in a per curiam opinion filed with the clerk this morning.
The writ of certiorari perviously granted by the Court is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Justice White found a dissenting opinion.
Justice O'Connor took no parts in either the consideration or the decision of the case
